(UNITURN mérőállomás kártyaolvasó)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_kartyaolvaso.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f700

safetop0.200
safebottom0.200
overcut0.500

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.0045

fmax700
fmin400
fratio0.6

z1 = 2
z2 = 0.500 # tekercs bemélyítés
c1 = 0.025 #furatok
c2 = 0.050 #letörések
c3 = 0.100 #keret


(olvasóhurok rögzítő)
b outline 0,0 size56,52 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.7,0.7 r3

h 28,26 z$z2 c$c1 d48 m1 np
h 28,26 z$z2 c$c1 d47 m1 np

h 5,47, z$z2 c$c1 d3 jg0.2 m1
h 51,47 z$z2 c$c1 d3 jg0.2 m1

(kábel bevezető)
l 28,53 28,47 z$z1 c$c2

(led)
l 8,2.5 16,2.5 z$z1 c$c2


y = 3.3
ox = 50
oy = 15.925

y1 = add($y, $d2);
y2 = sub($y, $d2);

x = 3.3

y11 = add($y, 1.85);
y12 = sub($y, 1.85);
x11 = add($x,0.25)
x12 = sub($x,0.25)
l $x11,$y11 $x11,$y12 z$z2 c$c2
l $x12,$y11 $x12,$y12 z$z2 c$c2

x = add($x, $ox);
y11 = add($y, 1.85);
y12 = sub($y, 1.85);
x11 = add($x,0.25)
x12 = sub($x,0.25)
l $x11,$y11 $x11,$y12 z$z2 c$c2
l $x12,$y11 $x12,$y12 z$z2 c$c2

y = add($y, $oy);
y1 = add($y, $d2);
y2 = sub($y, $d2);
x = 3.3
y11 = add($y, 1.85);
y12 = sub($y, 1.85);
x11 = add($x,0.25)
x12 = sub($x,0.25)
l $x11,$y11 $x11,$y12 z$z2 c$c2
l $x12,$y11 $x12,$y12 z$z2 c$c2
x = add($x, $ox);
y11 = add($y, 1.85);
y12 = sub($y, 1.85);
x11 = add($x,0.25)
x12 = sub($x,0.25)
l $x11,$y11 $x11,$y12 z$z2 c$c2
l $x12,$y11 $x12,$y12 z$z2 c$c2

#b corners 5,5 size$ox,$oy z$z1 c$c1 d2.75 jg0.05

#h 5,5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2
#h 61.5,5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2

#h 70,5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2
#h 70,13.5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2

#h 70,36.5 z$z1 c$c1 d3 m1 jg0.2
